itunes:title: Leviticus Week 1 with Wendell & Devaney Cole
title: Leviticus Week 1 with Wendell & Devaney Cole
description:
Welcome to the first week of our Leviticus reading plan! This week, Raechel and Amanda are joined by Wendell and Devaney Cole. Wendell currently serves as a pastor, and Devaney is a clinical scientist. Providing a framework for approaching the book of Leviticus, this episode reminds us of the role of Leviticus in the grand narrative of Scripture. Throughout the episode you’ll find helpful notes to consider as you seek to read and understand Leviticus, a book highlighting a holy God who established a way to dwell among His sinful people. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth Leviticus reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Leviticus collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/leviticus-week-1-with-wendell-devaney-cole
